sentences.en: ...a steel mill.
sentences.cn: …一家钢厂。

sentences.en: Add some freshly milled black pepper.
sentences.cn: 加一些现磨的黑胡椒粉。

sentences.en: All our flours are milled using traditional methods.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的面粉全是用传统方法碾磨的。

sentences.en: an old Victorian cotton mill
sentences.cn: 一家维多利亚时期的旧纱厂

sentences.en: Even the director has gone through the mill, you know.
sentences.cn: 你知道, 即使经理也受到过艰苦的磨炼.

sentences.en: Every miller draws water to his own mill.
sentences.cn: 磨坊主都往自己磨里注水.

sentences.en: Every night you could hear the whistles of the steel mill.
sentences.cn: 每晚你都会听见炼钢厂的下班哨声。

sentences.en: For many they clearly represent an alternative to run-of-the-mill estate cars.
sentences.cn: 对于很多人来说，他们显然可以作为一般旅行车的替代品。

sentences.en: He met mill hands, miners and farm labourers.
sentences.cn: 他见过工厂工人、矿工和农场工人。

sentences.en: He sauntered along the river to the mill.
sentences.cn: 他沿着河边漫步走到磨坊。

sentences.en: He wrote a meritorious theme about his visit to the cotton mill.
sentences.cn: 他写了一篇关于参观棉纺织厂的有价值的论文.

sentences.en: He’s really been through the mill recently.
sentences.cn: 他最近真是饱受磨难。

sentences.en: More than half the workers and staff members in this mill are women.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂过半数的职工是妇女.

sentences.en: Paper is made in a paper mill.
sentences.cn: 纸是在造纸厂生产的.

sentences.en: The farmer took his grain to the mill.
sentences.cn: 这个农民把谷子送到磨房.

sentences.en: The mill incorporated with others.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂与别家合并了.

sentences.en: The rice mill was wrecked by the enemy bombing.
sentences.cn: 碾米厂遭到了敌机的轰炸.

sentences.en: There was an old mill that really did grind corn.
sentences.cn: 有一个真正碾磨玉米的老磨坊。

sentences.en: They do not have the capacity to mill the grain.
sentences.cn: 他们没有碾磨谷物的能力。

sentences.en: They mill 1,000 tonnes of flour a day in every Australian state.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚各州每天都要磨1,000吨面粉。

sentences.en: This old mill has been grinding away for over 50 years.
sentences.cn: 50多年来,这间老磨坊一直在磨粮食.

sentences.en: We watched the logs floating towards the mill.
sentences.cn: 我们看着木头朝磨坊漂去.

words.tran_cn: 碾磨；磨成粉；滚（碾轧）金属（mill的ing形式）
[工经]工厂；磨坊；[化工][粮食][机]磨粉机；制造厂；压榨机
搅拌；[机]碾磨；磨细；使乱转

phrases.phrase: go (或 put someone) through the mill

phrases.tran_cn: 研磨机，磨碎机；辊轧机；破碎机
扁钢热轧机；带钢热轧机
n. 滚筒辗粉机；滚压机
带钢轧机；带材轧机；钢带轧机；板条辊轧机
[口语] 经受磨炼；饱尝辛酸；通过严格的训练

trans.tran_cn: 磨坊，磨粉机，榨汁机，工厂
trans.tran_en: a building containing a large machine for crushing grain into flour
To mill something such as wheat or pepper means to grind it in a mill

trans.tran_cn: 研磨，粉碎，搅拌，磨，铣，轧花边（在纸币上）
